name: Lightscapade
description:
Rejoin the lost lights together in the depths of Lightscapade, a quick-paced action roguelike!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Fire

Left Shift - Dash

Don't let your light bar run out! Find the other light in time and slay the darkness!

Note: This game is simple and buggy, but I'm a 15 year old developer that's been using Unity for 2 years and this is my first game jam. I'm proud of it nonetheless, and I'd like to develop it further.
